CustomField.description: To calculate the response, you can configure a formula that utilizes supported mathematical operations ( addition (+), subtraction (-), multiplication (*), division (/), and modulo (%) ). To build the formula, you can use responses from previously answered questions as well as a static value, also known as a factor. For instance, you could create a formula like this: {{{Q1.Response}}} + {{{Q2.Response}}} * 2. This formula would add the response from Question 1 to twice the response from Question 2.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a formula to calculate the response. Use standard math operations (addition (+), subtraction (-), multiplication (*), division (/), and modulo (%)), and functions ROUND and ABS. You can include responses from previous questions and static values. E.g. {{{Q1.Response}}} + {{{Q2.Response}}} * 2+ ROUND({{{Q1.Response}}},2), and ABS(ROUND(({{{Q1.Response}}}+{{{Q1.Response}}})/2,2)).
CustomField.label: Response Formula
